|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7612EN; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "CN51BRM", "M01H094CT00 LF" and "EWW509-A1-LO REV:015(XB)" is silkscreened on the black board in the photos. {{see also|Lenovo Newifi mini|Foxconn}}
===Specifications=== * Product segment: AC1200 (867+300 Mbps) * Antenna: 2x dual-band internal antenna * Operating Frequency: 2.4/5GHz * Power Supply: : AC Input : 110~240V (50~60Hz) : DC Output : 12V with max. 2A current
==Links of Interest== [https://world.taobao.com/item/547008438849.htm Taobao page]
===Wikis=== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/lenovo/lenovo_newifi_d1 ''Lenovo Newifi D1'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ([[Lenovo Newifi 2]]) *[https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/d-team/d-team_newifi_d2 ''D-Team Newifi D2'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ([[Lenovo Newifi 3]]) *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/doc/howto/benchmark.openssl#benchmark_table_other_operating_systems Benchmarking results for the ''Newifi2 D1'' on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ([https://dev.openwrt.org/ticket/20890 Jingdong]), :if this is the Newifi D1, [https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/lenovo/lenovo_newifi_d1 it would appear to be supported by OpenWrt] :''Newifi2 D1'' - [[MediaTek MT7621A]] (overclock to @1.2GHz) SoC :(MIPS 1004Kc V2.15), 796.67 BogoMIPS (595.96 on @880MHz) :FW by ''Padavan'': mod by hiboy (3.4.3.9), mod by bkye [https://github.com/bkye/rt-n56u/tree/master/trunk/configs/boards (D1, Y1S, Mini)]
===Forum threads=== *[http://koolshare.cn/thread-47024-1-1.html On '''KoolShare''' forum] :[[MediaTek]] MT7621AT, MT7603EN (2.4G N300), MT7612EN (5G AC866), :Flash 32/128MB, RAM 256MBï¼Œ1x USB3.0, 1xUSB2.0, microSD Card slot *[http://www.newbandeng.com/thread-22532-1-1.html On '''NewBandEng''' forum] :[[Lenovo Newifi D1]] - [[MediaTek]] MT7621A @880MHz Dual Core CPU :32MB SPI Flash, 256MB DDR3 RAM, 8GB MLC TF Card slot, :1x WAN, 2x LAN, 2x USB 2.0 (??), 2x 6TB HDD/SSD support *[http://bbs.mydigit.cn/read.php?tid=1664680 On '''MyDigit''' forum] *[http://bbs.newifi.com/thread-8-1-1.html On '''Newifi''' forum]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/lenovo/lenovo_newifi_d1 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/lenovo/newifi_d1 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt7621 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 17.01.0 |current_supported_version = <!-- auto --> |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
